subject: Hockey, Ice
Fines (Penalties)
Athletics and Sports
lead_paragraph: The N.H.L. fined the Rangers and the Maple Leafs as a result of an incident before their game Saturday night. Sean Avery was accused of making derogatory comments about Leafs forward Jason Blake.
snippet: The N.H.L. fined the Rangers and the Maple Leafs as a result of an incident before their game Saturday night. Sean Avery was accused of making derogatory comments about Leafs forward Jason Blake.
